Module com.t.snakeGame
Package com.t.snakeGame.controller

Class PlayingController

java.lang.Object
com.t.snakeGame.controller.PlayingController
public class PlayingController extends Object
This class represents a controller for playingView.fxml. It defines the method for switching to scoreView.fxml.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialize the game with the apple and the snake. The timer is also initialized for the snake motion. Accept the key input from the user.
